attributes.action: We support the PMs endeavours to deliver Brexit by whatever means available
attributes.additional_details: we are relieved and grateful that our new Prime Minister, Boris Johnson, has the guts and tenacity to lead us out of the EU.
attributes.background: Since Parliament has tried its utmost to thwart Brexit and not deliver the 2016 referendum result, the Prime Minister has no option but to do whatever he can to enable us to leave the EU on 31 October 2019 even if that means proroguing parliament. We MUST leave Deal or No Deal.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
